---
title: "RemoteWorkflow"
description: "Notte workflow that can be run on the cloud or locally"
---



Workflows are saved in the notte console for easy access and versioning for users

## Methods

### delete

```python
delete() -> None
```

Delete the workflow from the notte console

---

### download

```python
download(workflow_path: str | None, version: str | None = None, decryption_key: str | None = None) -> str
```

Download the workflow code from the notte console as a python file

**Returns:**

`str`

---

### fork

```python
fork() -> 'RemoteWorkflow'
```

Fork a shared workflow into your own private workflow

**Returns:**

[`RemoteWorkflow`](/sdk-reference/misc/remoteworkflow)

---

### get_curl

```python
get_curl(variables: Any) -> str
```

Convert the workflow/run to a curl request

**Returns:**

`str`

---

### get_run

```python
get_run(run_id: str) -> GetWorkflowRunResponse
```

Get a workflow run by its ID

**Returns:**

[`GetWorkflowRunResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/getworkflowrunresponse)

---

### get_url

```python
get_url(version: str | None = None, decryption_key: str | None = None) -> str
```

**Returns:**

`str`

---

### replay

```python
replay() -> MP4Replay
```

Replay the workflow run

**Returns:**

[`MP4Replay`](/sdk-reference/misc/mp4replay)

---

### run

```python
run(version: str | None = None, local: bool = False, restricted: bool = True, timeout: int | None = None, stream: bool = True, raise_on_failure: bool = True, workflow_run_id: str | None = None, log_callback: Callable[[str], None] | None = None, variables: Any) -> WorkflowRunResponse
```

Run the workflow using the specified version and variables

**Returns:**

[`WorkflowRunResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/workflowrunresponse)

---

### stop_run

```python
stop_run(run_id: str) -> UpdateWorkflowRunResponse
```

Manually stop a workflow run by its ID

**Returns:**

[`UpdateWorkflowRunResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/updateworkflowrunresponse)

---

### update

```python
update(workflow_path: str, version: str | None = None) -> None
```

Update the workflow with a a new code version

---



## Module

`notte_sdk.endpoints.workflows`
